note.query: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dm.[Dim_ERP_CustomerMapping_Missing] WHERE Customer_Name not like '一次性现金客户%' AND Customer_Name not like '合肥苏鲜生超市采购有限公司';
note.title: [Notification] OmniChannel CustomerMapping Missing
note.body:
dm.[Dim_ERP_CustomerMapping_Missing]表中发现有缺失Customer Mapping，会影响到Omni Channel首页中该Customer归类在Other渠道中。
需要参考更新以下表：
update [dm].[Dim_Channel] set Channel_Type='CP' ,Channel_Category='CP - West' ,Channel_Name_Display=Channel_Name_Short ,Channel_Handler='Salvatore Yang' ,Team='Dragon Team' ,Team_Handler='Daniel' where Channel_Name_Short='成都市众合晟'
EXEC [dm].[SP_Dim_Channel_Update]
note.returntable: SELECT Monthkey,Customer_Name FROM dm.[Dim_ERP_CustomerMapping_Missing] WHERE Customer_Name not like '一次性现金客户%' AND Customer_Name not like '合肥苏鲜生超市采购有限公司'
